job_description: Is a resident of the caravan outpost.

dynamic_line: There are other settlements out there in the wastes, but they're probably quite far away.
I wish I had my own car, I could go anywhere with one.

dynamic_line.yes: You've got a pretty sharp eye for the scrap I have lying around here, I can tell you're perceptive. Have you considered working for Crimson Caravan or the Junk Guild?
dynamic_line.no: It might not look like much to a normal person, but this scrap is worth its weight in well, it's weight!

dynamic_line.yes: You seem pretty bright, You could probably make a name for yourself in the wasteland.
dynamic_line.no: I wonder what the next caravan will bring.

dynamic_line.yes: I hope the harvest is good this year, eating out of old tins from before the war gets boring after a while.
dynamic_line.no: Uh, are you sure you're alright. You don't seem put-together mentally, not to be rude.

dynamic_line: Can you believe that some towns are based around undetonated nuclear bombs? Can you believe that there are people that talk about that for hours on end like it's profound?

u_male: How has wasteland life been treating you, <name_g>
no: Ma'am, what do you think of this place?

responses.text: How has town life been treating you lately?

dynamic_line: Not much has happened recently, but there's always more work to be done. Sometimes caravans come in, sometimes they don't.
